sourcesContent: import React,{useContext} from "react" import { CModal, CModalHeader, CButton, CModalBody, CModalFooter, CRow, CCol } from '@coreui/react' import ArticleProvider from "../context/ArticleContext" const ModalMe=({showToast})=>{ const {modal,setModal}=useContext(ArticleProvider.Context) return ( <> console.log("hi")} > Gallery Left Right {/* Left Right */} {/* onChange(e)} />:"" } */} {}} color="primary" size="md" block md="12">Add IMage Do Something{' '} setModal(!modal)} >Cancel ) } export default ModalMe
